metadata.synopsis: In order to slow Rommel's advance on the Suez canal, a group of Allied soldiers cross the Libyan desert to destroy enemy fuel reserves and stop tanks dead in their tracks. The 90 men, a combination of German-born Jews and British commandos, employ disguise and cunning to outwit the German and Italian enemy forces that they encounter.

reviews: The results are noise, flames and fireworks that will give action film fans their money's worth.
